I don't understand how Black-Box repacks never create false positive cracks, while Skidrow frequently creates false positive cracks. I realize these Skidrow cracks are not viruses that damage your computer, but it's still annoying to deal with files that are incompatible with your anti-virus software. You can also make an argument that those cracks actually are viruses. They are simply benign ones. Anyway, ripped or repacked games never create false positive cracks and it's one of many reasons why I download them. Black-box is the best in how they repack everything into a nice ready-made installer. I hear .rar pieces download faster, by the way. If you see a file uploaded as individual .rar pieces, instead of a full iso, it's done to create faster downloads.

@rentonek:hi buddy i too faced same problem...once check ur v-sync in game options..if its on turn it off...now go to c:/documents/ubisoft/driversanfrancisco/graphics.ini....in it edit verticalsync="0" & renderquality="1"....and mark graphics.ini as read only..this should work..it worked for me

this works perfect, but you do need the crack too https://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6698740/Driver_San_Francisco_Crack_gRabb9

also i can see there's been some problems with people deleting the 'settings.yml' in Application Data.... here's what you need to do if you get the error 'Ubisoft Game Launcher has stopped working'[etc]

Right click AppData folder, go to Properties and make all files read/writable (untick the 'hidden' and 'read-only' boxes)

Then install ...

Then go to AppData/Local/Ubisoft ... NOW delete settings.yml ... OR ... if there is no settings.yml, go back to Local and delete the entire Ubisoft folder

100 % TRIED TESTED WORKING
